column1: echo ¦echo¦mariadb-server-10.0 mysql-server/root_password password $DBPASS | debconf-set-selections && echo mariadb-server-10.0 mysql-server/root_password_again password $DBPASS | debconf-set-selections :: Filesystem_operation
echo ¦echo¦'deb http://ftp.debian.org/debian jessie-backports main' | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/backports.list :: Filesystem_operation
